CustomField.description: CLAIMS -328. This field will be populated the first time the 'Status Date: Payment Document Generated' field is populated by Conga. It will be used on a Rollup Sumary field on the Case object
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populated the first time a payment request is generated and the settlement acceptance received date has to be filled in. (If the Settlement Acceptance Receive Date is empty, this will NEVER be populated.)
CustomField.label: Initial Status Date: Payment Generated
